system.requirements:
Tier 2: Inquisitor E.Adv, Perception 45
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Social
system.effect: Inquisitor can spend a Fate Point to increase or decrease their group's subtlety by 1d10 + Willpower Bonus at any time.

description.value: Inquisitor can spend a Fate Point to increase or decrease their group's subtlety by 1d10 + Willpower Bonus at any time.
